Bath time
is now fun time

This is a brand that is
trusted by parents and loved by kids.

It is a range of children’s premium personal care products and has been a leading international brand for over 20 years. It strives to provide quality products which encourage good hygiene practice among kids by making their bathtime a fun time.

Mom's Corner

Did you know that bathing can help in the development of your child’s motor skills?

Activities like splashing water, squeezing bath liquid out of bottles, playing with bottles of different shapes and colours, help in better coordination of your child’s muscle movements. Buy a bottle and watch your kid enjoy bathing!

All products are specially formulated with ‘Fruito-E’ which is a natural combination of fruit extracts. Fruito-E is rich in vitamins and nutrients that help soothe, moisturize, and nourish your child’s delicate hair and skin.

Kids Corner

With this, the bathroom becomes a magical world of fun and frolic. The bubbles, the fruity smell, and the colourful bottles make bathing so exciting!
